interface.name: ListModel
interface.javadoc:
This interface defines the methods components like JList use to get the value of each cell in a list and the length of the list. Logically the model is a vector, indices vary from 0 to ListDataModel.getSize() - 1. Any change to the contents or length of the data model must be reported to all of the ListDataListeners.
<E> the type of the elements of this model
Hans Muller
JList

Returns the length of the list.
the length of the list
Returns the value at the specified index. index the requested index the value at index
Adds a listener to the list that's notified each time a change to the data model occurs. l the ListDataListener to be added
Removes a listener from the list that's notified each time a change to the data model occurs. l the ListDataListener to be removed
